custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplications_Users
SELECT COUNT(oau) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplications_Users oau, OAuthApplication oa WHERE (oa.ownerId = ?) AND (oa.applicationId = oau.applicationId) AND (oau.authorized = ?)
SELECT oau FROM OAuthApplications_Users oau, OAuthApplication oa WHERE (oa.ownerId = ?) AND (oa.applicationId = oau.applicationId) AND (oau.authorized = ?)
